channel.title: IPaintSmallThings on Bibmod
channel.description: Recent content in IPaintSmallThings on Bibmod

item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > iPaintSmallThings > Visors_and_Goggles [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://cults3d.com/en/3d-model/game/visors-and-goggles

Id objet : visors-and-goggles

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • 28mm IMP Bits

Collections pour tags :

  • 28mm IMP Bits NONDL SUP

Description :

1
2
3

These aren't pre-supported, because they are meant to be clipped into objects in blender/your slicing software. Also, they are very simple haha some are better than others and that's ok (some made in blender, some in tinkerCAD). Hopefully it inspires you to make your own with simple shapes!

I added an example of what some look like when used on some prints from Reptilian Overlords.

Justification du tag SUP :

These aren’t pre-supported, because they are meant to be clipped into objects in blender/your slicing software. Also, they are very simple haha some are better than others and that’s ok (some made in blender, some in tinkerCAD). Hopefully it inspires you to make your own with simple shapes!

item.title: [GRATUIT] Thingiverse > iPaintSmallThings > Mining_Light [non dl]
item.description:
Source : https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:4824963

Id objet : 4824963

Prix : 0 euros

Collections :

  • 28mm epic ORKS Bits Builders
  • 28mm ORKS Builders

Collections pour tags :

  • 28mm epic ORKS Bits Builders NONDL NONSUP
  • 28mm ORKS Builders NONDL NONSUP

Description :

1
2
3

A few different mining lights to help soldiers see in the underground. Glue onto shoulders, backpacks, vehicles, or terrain (or whatever -- I'm not your boss)!

Scale to 110% to fit other 25mm wargames.
